strength_details: Clear role focused on reporting and visualization.
Stable employment with a well-known company (IBM).
concern_details: Immediate start date suggests potential for time pressure.
Reliance on legacy technology (Cognos) may indicate tech debt.
best_fit_details: Mid-level data engineers with 3+ years of experience.
Candidates comfortable with traditional BI tools and reporting.
probe_details: Clarify reporting structure and team dynamics.
Understand typical work hours and on-call expectations.
Inquire about the future roadmap for the reporting systems.
summary.overall_assessment: This is a stable, well-defined role with a large company, but it relies on legacy technology and may require overtime. Best suited for mid-level engineers comfortable with traditional BI tools.
